translation.it: Solo allora vieni visto come un potenziale vero uomo.

translation.it: Ma devi processarli in tribunale e dimostrarlo.

translation.it: Sembrava un barbiere.

translation.en: It was all set up with a regular barber's chair,
translation.it: Era tutto sistemato con una normale poltrona da barbiere,

translation.en: with the phone right next to it.
translation.it: con il telefono accanto.

translation.en: Clearly, that's where John would sit.
translation.it: Chiaramente, John si sedeva lì.

translation.en: I mean, knowing his personality. Everybody was below him.
translation.it: Conoscendo la sua personalità. Gli altri erano tutti sottomessi.

translation.en: So we put a bug in there.
translation.it: Così mettemmo una cimice lì.

translation.en: [O'Hara] They were inside for about 20, 25 minutes
translation.it: Erano dentro da circa 20, 25 minuti,

translation.en: when suddenly a car rolled past.
translation.it: quando all'improvviso passò un'auto.

translation.en: And they were sitting there looking at the Bergin Hunt & Fish Club.
translation.it: E rimasero lì a guardare il Bergin Hunt & Fish Club.

translation.en: This was a very precarious situation,
translation.it: Era una situazione molto precaria.

translation.en: and I warned the team that
translation.it: Avvertii la squadra.

translation.en: [through radio] somebody is suspicious and getting visits.
translation.it: C'è qualcuno di sospetto. Avrete visite.

translation.en: We heard somebody shaking the door.
translation.it: Sentimmo qualcuno muovere la serratura.

translation.en: Were they going to go in the place? Did they have guns?
translation.it: Sarebbero entrati? Erano armati?

translation.en: I said, "Nobody move. We're the burglars."
translation.it: Dissi: "Nessuno si muova. Noi siamo i ladri.

translation.en: "Let's see what they do."
translation.it: Vediamo cosa fanno".

translation.en: [O'Hara] I decided to come out around the corner.
translation.it: Decisi di girare l'angolo.

translation.en: For some unknown reason, they followed me.
translation.it: Non so perché, ma mi seguirono.

translation.en: And they followed me for about three-quarters of a mile.
translation.it: Mi seguirono per un chilometro.

translation.en: The entry team finished their job real quick.
translation.it: La squadra finì in fretta il lavoro.

translation.en: And like thieves in the night, beat feet.
translation.it: E come ladri nella notte, se ne andarono.

translation.en: Now we've got the bug in.
translation.it: Le cimici erano posizionate.

translation.en: We ran a hard cable to our analyst, Greg Stasiuk,
translation.it: Installammo un cavo fino al nostro esperto, Greg Stasiuk,

translation.en: so he can listen and extract the intelligence.
translation.it: così poteva ascoltarli ed estrapolare informazioni utili.

translation.en: [Gregory Stasiuk] One of the very first conversations I listened to,
translation.it: Nella prima conversazione che ho ascoltato,

translation.en: all of a sudden, I hear them talking about killing someone.
translation.it: all'improvviso hanno discusso di uccidere qualcuno.

translation.en: I'm thinking, "Oh my God, I can't believe they're open about this. Amazing."
translation.it: Pensai: "Dio, non posso credere che ne parlino apertamente".

translation.en: [Stasiuk] But the sound just didn't sound right.
translation.it: Ma l'audio non era pulito.

translation.en: It just sounded kind of off, like it really wasn't right.
translation.it: C'era qualcosa di strano che non andava.

translation.en: Then I realized no one was in the room.
translation.it: Poi ho capito che non c'era nessuno.

translation.en: The TV was on. And some mob movie was on. And it was just people talking on the TV.
translation.it: C'era la televisione accesa su un film sulla mafia. Erano i dialoghi del film.

translation.en: And then finally I heard the voice of John Gotti himself.
translation.it: Alla fine, sentii la voce di John Gotti in persona.

translation.en: And his voice has a presence.
translation.it: La sua voce era importante.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] The court gives us 90 seconds to determine if the conversation is criminal or not.
translation.it: La corte ci dà 90 secondi per capire se la conversazione è criminale.

translation.en: And then we have to stop recording and stop listening.
translation.it: Poi dobbiamo smettere di registrare e ascoltare.

translation.en: And then, after maybe two minutes, they go back on.
translation.it: Dopo due minuti, possiamo riprendere.

translation.en: During those 90 seconds we would get him whistling or… Pretty boring stuff.
translation.it: In quei 90 secondi, lo sentivamo fischiettare o parlare del niente.

translation.en: But you got some insight into him, even during those 90 seconds.
translation.it: Ma anche in quei 90 secondi, ottenevamo informazioni su di lui.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] You can tell from the conversation,
translation.it: Si capiva dalle conversazioni

translation.en: everybody looked at him as an up-and-comer.
translation.it: che tutti lo consideravano un emergente.

translation.en: He was admired by his men.
translation.it: Lo ammiravano.

translation.en: [Ruggiano] He was always smart, sharp, funny.
translation.it: Era sempre intelligente, furbo, fdivertente.

translation.en: He just had a presence about him.
translation.it: Aveva una certa presenza.

translation.en: It was like a moth to a flame. That's what it was like.
translation.it: Era come una luce che attira le falene.

translation.en: One thing you could tell is that John Gotti had a gambling addiction.
translation.it: John Gotti era dipendente dal gioco d'azzardo.

translation.en: [announcer] The feature race, the eighth, and they're off.
translation.it: Ottava gara, sono partiti.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] The initial court order gives you the authority
translation.it: L'ordinanza del tribunale ci permetteva

translation.en: to do electronic surveillance for 30 days,
translation.it: di sorvegliarli per 30 giorni,

translation.en: and then you have to renew it.
translation.it: poi andava rinnovata.

translation.en: And you have to keep finding crimes in the conversations
translation.it: Dovevamo continuare a scovare crimini

translation.en: in order to renew the electronic surveillance.
translation.it: per poter rinnovare la sorveglianza.

translation.en: [Goldstock] The problem was, because Gotti gambled himself,
translation.it: Il problema era che Gotti giocava d'azzardo

translation.en: it muddied the waters as to what was legal and what was illegal.
translation.it: e ciò confondeva le acque su cos'era legale e cosa no.

translation.en: It's not illegal to gamble.
translation.it: Non è illegale giocare d'azzardo.

translation.en: It's only to run a gambling operation that's illegal in New York.
translation.it: A New York è illegale gestire un'operazione di scommesse.

translation.en: [announcer] …for 192 yards. New England with two touchdowns within 15 seconds!
translation.it: …175 metri. Il New England segna due touchdown in 15 secondi!

translation.en: [Goldstock] We decided that it wasn't worth keeping the bug in there.
translation.it: Decidemmo che non era più utile tenere lì la cimice.

translation.en: So we notified the court, and we stopped the bugging process.
translation.it: Così avvisammo il tribunale e interrompemmo l'intercettazione.

translation.en: There was nothing that we heard that would indicate
translation.it: Non c'era niente che indicasse

translation.en: that Gotti was planning an attack on Castellano.
translation.it: che Gotti stava pianificando un attacco a Castellano.

translation.en: [anchor] Our lead story is still that hit in Manhattan,
translation.it: DICEMBRE 1985 Parleremo dell'omicidio a Manhattan, l'esecuzione di Paul Castellano.

translation.en: the execution of big Paul Castellano.
translation.it: Parleremo dell'omicidio a Manhattan, l'esecuzione di Paul Castellano.

translation.en: A Brooklyn funeral parlor is filled with flowers tonight
translation.it: La stanza mortuaria è piena di fiori

translation.en: for Castellano's wake,
translation.it: per la veglia di Castellano.

translation.en: and no doubt some sent by the man who ordered the killing.
translation.it: Senza dubbio, alcuni sono stati inviati dal mandante.

translation.en: [reporter] The speculation in law enforcement circles centers on the man
translation.it: Le indagini delle forze dell'ordine si concentrano sull'uomo

translation.en: believed to be the person who would most profit by Castellano's death,
translation.it: che avrebbe tratto più vantaggio dalla morte di Castellano,

translation.en: alleged Gambino family capo and possible successor, John Gotti.
translation.it: il presunto capo e successore della famiglia Gambino, John Gotti.

translation.en: [Ruggiano] After the hit, a week later, all the captains met.
translation.it: Una settimana dopo l'assassinio, i boss si riunirono.

translation.en: They voted John in, and then John had a big Christmas party in the El Carib.
translation.it: Votarono a favore di John, che tenne una festa di Natale a El Carib.

translation.en: [Giovino] The best way I could explain it
translation.it: Per farvi capire,

translation.en: is when the movie stars all wait for the Academy Awards.
translation.it: era come la notte degli Oscar per gli attori.

translation.en: This is all the families, and everybody is waiting.
translation.it: Si riunivano tutte le famiglie, non si vedeva l'ora.

translation.en: "Let's go, tonight's the big night."
translation.it: "Andiamo, è la grande serata."

translation.en: [Ruggiano] And it was mobbed. You couldn't get in the door.
translation.it: Era strapieno. Non si passava dalla porta.

translation.en: Everybody wanted to be up John's ass.
translation.it: Tutti volevano leccare il culo a John.

translation.en: The whole family came. There was, like, 300 guys there.
translation.it: C'era tutta la famiglia, saranno state 300 persone.

translation.en: I was included. And, you know, that's when he came out as the boss.
translation.it: Partecipai anche io. Fu lì che rivelò di essere il boss.

translation.en: He walked in like a powerhouse.
translation.it: Entrò da vera celebrità.

translation.en: Shoulders back, very confident, very strong personality.
translation.it: Spalle indietro, molto sicuro di sé, con una personalità forte.

translation.en: And everybody was going over to him.
translation.it: Tutti volevano salutarlo.

translation.en: "Hey, John, congratulations." Kissing. Shaking his hand. "Congratulations."
translation.it: "John, congratulazioni." Bacio e stretta di mano. Ripeti.

translation.en: [Ruggiano] I was thrilled. He was in my neighborhood.
translation.it: Ero felice. Era del mio quartiere.

translation.en: Now I had a good relationship with the boss.
translation.it: Ora avevo un buon rapporto col boss.

translation.en: You know, he liked me.
translation.it: Gli stavo simpatico.

translation.en: It was just a happy mood.
translation.it: Era un bel periodo.

translation.en: [reporter] Look at this man's face. He may already be the new godfather.
translation.it: Guardate quest'uomo. Potrebbe essere il nuovo padrino.

translation.en: Lawmen believe he may have also been behind this.
translation.it: Si ritiene che sia il mandante di questo omicidio.

translation.en: His name is John Gotti.
translation.it: Si chiama John Gotti.

translation.en: He is a member of the Gambino crime family,
translation.it: Fa parte della famiglia criminale Gambino,

translation.en: the family that Castellano ran.
translation.it: prima gestita da Castellano.

translation.en: [Mary Murphy] When you see the mug shot, it stands out right away.
translation.it: Salta subito una cosa all'occhio dalla foto segnaletica.

translation.en: He was a handsome guy.
translation.it: Era un bel ragazzo.

translation.en: We start doing research.
translation.it: Iniziammo a fare ricerche.

translation.en: We find out that he was a plumbing supply salesman,
translation.it: Scoprimmo che era un rivenditore di articoli da idraulici

translation.en: according to his business card. Making $25,000 a year.
translation.it: in base al suo biglietto da visita. Guadagnava 25.000 dollari l'anno.

translation.en: Yet he's riding around in a $60,000 Mercedes.
translation.it: Eppure guidava una Mercedes da 60.000 dollari.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] After Castellano and Tommy Bilotti were killed,
translation.it: PADRINO UCCISO Dopo la morte di Castellano e Tommy Bilotti,

translation.en: we went back through our tapes to see if there was any information
translation.it: ricontrollammo le registrazioni per eventuali dettagli

translation.en: that would support John Gotti being involved
translation.it: sul coinvolgimento di John Gotti

translation.en: in the Paul Castellano, Tommy Bilotti homicides.
translation.it: negli omicidi di Paul Castellano e Tommy Bilotti.

translation.en: [Rayano] Some of the recordings, the detective who was monitoring would mark them as inaudible.
translation.it: Alcune registrazioni erano state definite "non udibili" dal detective.

translation.en: So we had to go back and review all of those tapes,
translation.it: Così, ricontrollammo quelle registrazioni,

translation.en: -particularly the inaudibles. -[tape rewinding and stopping]
translation.it: soffermandoci su quelle non udibili.

translation.en: And that's where we started to put the pieces together.
translation.it: E fu lì che iniziammo a mettere insieme i pezzi.

translation.en: We recognized that early that summer,
translation.it: Ci rendemmo conto che all'inizio di quell'estate,

translation.en: there was a great deal of tension inside the Gambino family
translation.it: c'era stata molta tensione all'interno della famiglia Gambino

translation.en: between Paul Castellano and John Gotti.
translation.it: tra Paul Castellano e John Gotti.

translation.en: Paul Castellano had an edict
translation.it: Paul Castellano aveva una regola: se spacciavi droga, saresti stato ucciso.

translation.en: that if you dealt in drugs, you would get killed.
translation.it: aveva una regola: se spacciavi droga, saresti stato ucciso.

translation.en: And that was the basis of John Gotti's problem in that early summer.
translation.it: E questo era il motivo del problema con John Gotti quell'estate.

translation.en: There was two guys in John's crew in the drug business.
translation.it: Due uomini di John erano coinvolti nel traffico di droga.

translation.en: One was his brother and one was his best friend.
translation.it: Suo fratello e il suo migliore amico.

translation.en: [Rayano] Well, they were arrested and under indictment for drug dealing.
translation.it: Sono stati arrestati e incriminati per spaccio di droga.

translation.en: -Get out of the way. -Out of the way.
translation.it: - Togliti di mezzo. - Fate largo.

translation.en: There was a standard code in the mob.
translation.it: La mafia aveva un codice.

translation.en: You weren't supposed to deal drugs, because you could get busted
translation.it: Non dovevi trafficare droga perché, se ti beccavano, ti davano 30, 40, 50 anni.

translation.en: and get 30, 40, 50 years.
translation.it: perché, se ti beccavano, ti davano 30, 40, 50 anni.

translation.en: Some of them will get life without parole.
translation.it: Perfino l'ergastolo senza condizionale.

translation.en: So, that allowed the government to pitch those guys, like,
translation.it: In questo modo, il governo li incastrava.

translation.en: "You know what? You wanna do life, or do you want to come over and become a witness or an informant?"
translation.it: "Vuoi passare la vita in carcere o vuoi diventare un testimone?"

translation.en: So, it was do the smack, get the whack.
translation.it: Se spacciavi, venivi ucciso.

translation.en: And a lot of the guys followed the rules, and they didn't make any money.
translation.it: Molti uomini seguivano le regole e non guadagnavano.

translation.en: But you gotta realize, the young guys were making big money.
translation.it: Mentre dei giovani facevano soldi a palate.

translation.en: I was a drug dealer, and I was dealing heroin and cocaine.
translation.it: Sono stato uno spacciatore e vendevo eroina e cocaina.

translation.en: Back then, I had 20,000 a week coming in. That was a fortune.
translation.it: All'epoca, intascavo 20.000 dollari alla settimana. Una fortuna!

translation.en: Sal was the best coke connection I ever had
translation.it: Sal era il mio fornitore di coca preferito. Non mi faceva pagare.

translation.en: because he never charged me any money, and he always had coke.
translation.it: Sal era il mio fornitore di coca preferito. Non mi faceva pagare. Aveva sempre la coca.

translation.en: Everybody was selling drugs.
translation.it: Tutti spacciavano.

translation.en: There was a rule that was, on the down-low, nobody kept.
translation.it: Quella regola, in pratica, non veniva rispettata da nessuno.

translation.en: Except guys like my father, old school guys.
translation.it: Tranne quelli come mio padre, della vecchia scuola.

translation.en: Guys would come to my father with suitcases full of heroin,
translation.it: Se portavano una valigia piena di eroina a mio padre

translation.en: and go, "Andy, go make yourself a couple hundred thousand."
translation.it: e gli dicevano: "Guadagna 200.000 dollari",

translation.en: And he'd go, "I don't want that shit." I told him, "Take it. Are you kidding me?"
translation.it: lui rispondeva: "Scordatevelo". E io: "Prendila, scherzi?"

translation.en: He said, "I don't want it. That's blood money."
translation.it: "Non la voglio. Sono soldi sporchi."

translation.en: "You're a murderer. You're worried about blood money?"
translation.it: "Sei un assassino e ti preoccupi di soldi sporchi?"

translation.en: He goes, "Because I'll be the guy they kill." "I'll be the guy they make an example out of."
translation.it: E lui: "Mi ucciderebbero. Darebbero l'esempio ammazzando me".

translation.en: [Rayano] John's crew recognized they were in dire straits,
translation.it: Gli uomini di John si resero conto di essere in difficoltà

translation.en: and that day of reckoning was gonna come.
translation.it: e la resa dei conti sarebbe arrivata.

translation.en: [O'Hara] John surrounded himself with some tough guys.
translation.it: John si era circondato di gente tosta.

translation.en: Because he knew what he was gonna do,
translation.it: Perché sapeva cosa avrebbe fatto

translation.en: and he wanted to be strong.
translation.it: e voleva essere forte.

translation.en: And then, maybe a week or two before Paul Castellano was killed,
translation.it: Una o due settimane prima che Paul Castellano fosse ucciso,

translation.en: Paul overlooked John
translation.it: Paul ignorò John

translation.en: and appointed Tommy Bilotti the underboss.
translation.it: e nominò Tommy Bilotti come vice.

translation.en: And that was the big mistake.
translation.it: Fu quello il suo sbaglio.

translation.en: John's like, "What are you fucking kidding me?"
translation.it: John pensò che fosse uno scherzo.

translation.en: John thought he was the next in line.
translation.it: Pensava avrebbe nominato lui.

translation.en: [Ruggiano] As far as John was concerned, that puts the icing on the cake.
translation.it: Per John, fu la goccia che fece traboccare il vaso.

translation.en: You know, now, if I'm John Gotti, I'm sitting back.
translation.it: Al suo posto, mi sarei fatto due domande.

translation.en: I say, "Look at this guy. He wants to kill my brother."
translation.it: "Quest'uomo vuole uccidere mio fratello.

translation.en: "Instead of making me the underboss, he made Tommy Bilotti the underboss."
translation.it: Invece di nominarmi vice, ha nominato Tommy Bilotti.

translation.en: "That means they're gonna come after me."
translation.it: Significa che vuole attaccarmi."

translation.en: Paul Castellano knows John's a threat,
translation.it: Paul Castellano sa che John è una minaccia

translation.en: and he wants John out of the picture.
translation.it: e lo vuole fuori dai giochi.

translation.en: And makes a remark to somebody that he was gonna take care of John Gotti
translation.it: Disse a un uomo che si sarebbe occupato di John Gotti

translation.en: right after Christmas.
translation.it: subito dopo Natale.

translation.en: Now, John Gotti, he's a gangster.
translation.it: John Gotti è un criminale.

translation.en: John Gotti does not give a fuck about Christmas.
translation.it: Non gliene frega un cazzo del Natale.

translation.en: Now it's either kill or be killed. And that was it, that was the last straw.
translation.it: O lo uccideva lui o veniva ucciso. Fu l'ultima goccia.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] There was one tape in particular recorded in June of 1985.
translation.it: C'era una registrazione in particolare del giugno del 1985.

translation.en: The audibility was not great.
translation.it: Non si sentiva bene.

translation.en: We had heard it before, but we didn't pay too much attention to it.
translation.it: L'avevamo già sentita, ma non avevamo prestato attenzione.

translation.en: But now we listen to it again and again.
translation.it: Così l'abbiamo riascoltata più volte. Sai… faremo allora? Tommy e l'altro tizio…

translation.en: [Stasiuk] We were very excited.
translation.it: Eravamo emozionati.

translation.en: Now we have that conversation now relating to a possible crime.
translation.it: Avevamo una conversazione su un possibile crimine.

translation.en: Because in December 1985, Paul Castellano and Tommy Bilotti are killed.
translation.it: A dicembre 1985 Paul Castellano e Tommy Bilotti vengono uccisi.

translation.en: John Gotti became our main target.
translation.it: John Gotti divenne il sospettato principale.

translation.en: [Gabriel] We're working the case on John, surveilling him.
translation.it: Sorvegliavamo John per il caso.

translation.en: But John Gotti's not going to go out on the street and shoot anybody anymore.
translation.it: Ma John Gotti non avrebbe più ucciso nessuno di suo pugno.

translation.en: He's gonna tell people to do that.
translation.it: L'avrebbe ordinato ad altri.

translation.en: That's the evidence I have to figure out how I get.
translation.it: Dovevo capire come trovare tale prova.

translation.en: So, ultimately, you have to put a bug in on a guy like John Gotti
translation.it: Dovevo per forza piazzare una cimice su John Gotti

translation.en: to put these people in jail.
translation.it: per mandarli in prigione.

translation.en: The intent was to try and put a bug in The Bergin Hunt & Fish.
translation.it: L'intento era mettere una cimice al The Bergin Hunt and Fish.

translation.en: And we find out that the OCTF got into it before us.
translation.it: Ma la task force contro la criminalità organizzata l'aveva già fatto.

translation.en: It's the price you pay for going after a guy like John Gotti.
translation.it: È il prezzo da pagare per John Gotti.

translation.en: There's a lot of egos involved, and other entities want to prosecute this guy.
translation.it: Molte altre persone e agenzie vogliono trovarlo.

translation.en: It's a career case for a prosecutor or an agent.
translation.it: Ne va della carriera di un procuratore o agente.

translation.en: Bruce had only one focus,
translation.it: Bruce aveva un solo obiettivo,

translation.en: and that was the Gambino family.
translation.it: la famiglia Gambino.

translation.en: There was nothing else in the world more important, and it was his.
translation.it: Niente al mondo era più importante. Era sua.

translation.en: And you didn't have any business in his backyard.
translation.it: E tu non dovevi toccargliela.

translation.en: It was like, um…
translation.it: Insomma…

translation.en: They didn't like us. So we didn't deal with them,
translation.it: Non gli piacevamo. Perciò non collaboravamo con loro,

translation.en: and I'm not gonna go into it.
translation.it: Non gli piacevamo. Perciò non collaboravamo con loro, ma non approfondirò.

translation.en: So we were the only game in town in New York City at the time,
translation.it: Eravamo l'unica squadra a New York ai tempi

translation.en: and we were gonna go ahead with our own case.
translation.it: e avremmo continuato a indagare.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] On December 26, we're able to switch the bugs
translation.it: Il 26 dicembre riattivammo le cimici

translation.en: inside the Bergin Hunt & Fish Club back on.
translation.it: dentro al Bergin Hunt & Fish Club.

translation.en: And we were back up on John Gotti again.
translation.it: Intercettavamo di nuovo Gotti.

translation.en: [Goldstock] And then we really hit the jackpot.
translation.it: E fu allora che facemmo tombola.

translation.en: There we are, taking the conversations that no one else could possibly have
translation.it: Erano conversazioni che nessun altro poteva avere

translation.en: within days of him becoming boss.
translation.it: a pochi giorni dalla sua nomina a boss.

translation.en: He was leaving no room for dissension.
translation.it: Non lasciava spazio al dissenso.

translation.en: John Gotti had people come praise him. He was relating how they praised him.
translation.it: John Gotti veniva elogiato. Parlava di come veniva osannato.

translation.en: He's learning everything that Paul Castellano was making money off of.
translation.it: Scoprì da dove venivano i guadagni di Paul Castellano.

translation.en: We were getting great conversations of him talking about money
translation.it: Stavamo registrando conversazioni riguardo a soldi

translation.en: coming in from the waterfront, money coming in from the Concrete Club,
translation.it: provenienti dal porto, dal Concrete Club

translation.en: money coming in from all the captains, all the soldiers.
translation.it: e delle somme dai vari vice e scagnozzi.

translation.en: And what's even better is he's naming them by their full names.
translation.it: E la cosa bella è che faceva nomi e cognomi.

translation.en: [Stasiuk] We were now seeing the caterpillar had come out of its cocoon, it's now the butterfly.
translation.it: Il bruco era uscito dal suo bozzolo ed era diventato una farfalla.

translation.en: The boss of the Gambino crime family.
translation.it: Il boss dei Gambino.

translation.en: And we were getting all those conversations.
translation.it: Registravamo quelle conversazioni.

translation.en: [Ruggiano] When John became the boss, we owned the city.
translation.it: Quando John divenne il boss, la città era nostra.

translation.en: Every walk of life. Every union. Every business.
translation.it: Ogni settore. Ogni sindacato. Ogni attività.

translation.en: You couldn't lay brick. You couldn't get cement.
translation.it: Non si trovavano mattoni o cemento.
